translation.en: You know, he may not drink, but...
she sure does.
Little girl's in serious pain. Laudanum.
I love Clara Bow.
Stuck, it looks like.
You folks need some help?
Oh, Lord, help me.
Hi, sweetie.
Kansas or Panhandle?
Check the file. See if any...

translation.en: That ain't factory.
How much that set you back?

translation.en: Not that I've had any since Lubbock.
Oh yeah, that's a good one.
This is an emergency alert.
Police are not releasing details, but it has been reported

translation.en: just north of Commerce, Oklahoma.
How far is that?
Twenty miles.
This don't look promising.
How are we today?
Well, it's never good when a peace officer goes down in the line.

translation.en: We need to get through, sir. Now.
Only the Bureau has multi-state jurisdiction.
We need to stay the trail.
This paper is worthless up here.

translation.en: So, unless you're government agents
or Oklahoma police officers, you're not passing this roadblock.

translation.en: Turn this vehicle around.
Goddammit.
Hey! What the hell do you think you're doing?
They need dope for the girl.
What's the closest large town?
You know what, Pancho? Maybe I should drive.
What town?
What's that?
Expense report.
It's how much we...
It's how much we cost.
How many bullets you got in you?

translation.en: Hell, I don't know.
Sixteen, I think.
You know, a man can't...
pass bullets through him like he can kidney stones.
translation.ko: 총알을 몸 밖으로 내보낼 수 없어 신장 결석이라면 모를까

translation.en: You...
It might be good to have a doctor look at you sometime.
translation.ko: 언제 한번 의사한테 검사 좀 받아보는 게 어때?

translation.en: It might be good to have a doctor look at you sometime.
translation.ko: 그러는 자네나 의사한테 검사 좀 받아보지?

translation.en: I ain't got no bullets in me.
Because I was covering you.
Clyde's ahead of us on the road. How long we gonna just sit here?
translation.ko: 클라이드가 우리보다 앞서가는데 언제까지 앉아만 있을 거야?

translation.en: I don't know. You got a better idea?
I don't know if it's better.
The file said there was one convict
translation.ko: 파일 보니까 재소자 하나가 이스텀 탈옥에 가담했다가

translation.en: tried to make that Eastham escape, but missed the bus.
translation.ko: 재소자 하나가 이스텀 탈옥에 가담했다가 차를 놓쳤다던데

translation.en: Wade McNabb.
-Why? -Well...
if you were a free man, wouldn't you try to meet up with your friends?

translation.en: McNabb's only in for firearms.

I'd wager she's not too happy about us expanding our jurisdiction.

translation.en: I'm just saying.
Maney.
Bonnie Parker.
I've seen ten of 'em today.
Yeah, it's the...
-It's the fashion. -All the rage.
-Where you going? -Nature calls.
Jiminy Christmas. You just went!
-Get in the picture, now! -Bonnie and Clyde!
It's them, around the corner!
Grab a shotgun.
I'm gonna back us out of here. Come on.
translation.ko: 일단 뒤로 뺄게 빨리 좀 가라

translation.en: Wasn't Ray Hamilton, neither. It was Henry Methvin,

translation.en: -the third man in the jailbreak. -I know, I saw him. You let him go?
translation.ko: 헨리 메스빈이더군 탈옥수 세 번째 알아, 봤어 근데 그냥 놔뒀어?

translation.en: Well, I had my eye on Clyde.
Clyde? You had your-- You had your eye on Clyde?
You had a shot?
Why didn't you take him?
Too many people. Goddamn fan club.

translation.en: Damn.
Right there!
I can't see 'em!
Yeah.
They stopped for a nice breakfast this morning.
French toast and coffee.
Clyde ordered himself a soft-boiled egg off the à la carte menu.

translation.en: Cute little diner in Amarillo.
-Amarillo? -Yeah.
Clyde drove 400 miles last night?
Four hundred and fifty.
Do you ever think, maybe...
Maybe it ain't in us no more?
He got through a thousand-man dragnet to deliver a bunny to Momma.

translation.en: What do we do now?
I just had the one idea.
Pancho!
Thank you, sir.
They tell me you're from the highway department, but...
I know who you really are.
I know a killer when I see one.
I'm sure you would, Mr. Barrow.
Look, mister.
I know y'all are gonna have to kill my boy.
translation.ko: 당신들이 우리 애를 죽일 거라는 거 압니다

translation.en: It ain't your fault.
He's gone past the point of redemption.
There's something I wanna say.
Here.
He wasn't born that way.
He wasn't born with no dark soul.
My little Huck Finn.
That's what me and Cumie called him.
He loved bicycles.
What he really wanted to be was a musician.
I mean, sure, he liked to dress fine and get the girls and all like that, but it...
translation.ko: 물론 옷도 잘 입고 여자 잘 꼬시고 그랬지만...

translation.en: You know, he wasn't a bad boy.
I had high hopes.
People don't always know who they are... until it's too late.
translation.ko: 사람들은 자기 실체를 잘 몰라요 너무 늦기 전까지는

translation.en: Oh, you mean one turn on the trail, huh?
That what you mean?
He stole a chicken.
He stole a goddamn chicken, mister,
and the law took him for a bad seed. And from that day forward,
translation.ko: 경찰이 걔를 악당으로 규정하더니 바로 그날 이후부터

translation.en: he was dogged by the law.
-Dogged him? -Yes, sir!
Dogged or watched him?
I guess it's all the same to you. You're a cop.
Yes, I am.
Growing up all I ever…
-All I ever wanted to be was a preacher. -Preacher?
You expect me to believe that?
I was saving up for the seminary.
Working for a sharecropper in San Saba.
Word got out that I was pretty handy with a pistol.

translation.en: if I wanted to make $150.
I laughed and said, “Who do I have to kill?”

That's when I knew...
he wasn't talking about killing a coyote or a polecat.

I told him I was gonna...
tell his business partner.
That wasn't too smart.
Well, I was 16!
Like I said, I was saving up for the seminary.

translation.en: Couple weeks later, he...
asked me to put some groceries in his house.

my back...

For whatever reasons I still don't know, he stepped right over me and went inside.

translation.en: Maybe to reload. I don't know, but I...
I scrambled away. Hid in an irrigation ditch.

translation.en: came along, found me,

translation.en: Come fall, I...
I packed up for the seminary.
At least, that's what I told 'em.

Rang the yard bell. He came out.
And I shot that son of a bitch dead, right there on that same porch.

translation.en: And there went my calling.

and I became the law.
One turn on the trail, huh?
Yes, sir.
One turn.
How come you're telling me all this?

translation.en: Maybe he was hungry.
Maybe we were all hungry.

He ain't gonna surrender.
You're just gonna hang him anyhow.
He'd rather be brought down on the run.

translation.en: it could be full parole.

translation.en: My kind of place.
How are you, darling?

translation.ko: - 좋은 방법이 몇 개 있는데 - 정말?

translation.en: Good to be off the farm, Wade?

translation.en: I dig.
Say you order me a do-over, slick.
Or not.
Where's the water closet?
So what do y'all need me to do?
Say, you bringing the cattle to market, Dad?
I swear, big man.

translation.ko: 클라이드가 왕일진 모르지만 난 텍사스 레인저다 이 머저리 놈아

translation.en: -When? -Tomorrow. Dinnertime.

translation.en: -He got y'all chasing your own tails. -Son, if you're telling the truth...

translation.en: What took you so long?
There's a fella in the toilet.
Are you Billie Mace?
You must be Billy Mace.
Hey, Granddad.
Wanna race again?
Didn't your momma teach you to tie your shoes?

translation.en: -We gonna see each other again? -No, sir.
Git!
"Git." Downright poetic.
"Headed for greener pastures.
See you next time around."
McNabb warned 'em.
McNabb! Open up the goddamn door!
Goddamn animals.
Did I get that boy killed?
No, sir.
You did not.
He would have been out in nine months on his own.
Fella did not...
have to die.
Maybe so, but that fella made his own choices.
See, Frank...
that's the difference right there between you and me.

behind some notion of right and wrong.
translation.ko: 옳고 그름의 개념 뒤로 하지만 난...

translation.en: Me, I never particularly liked the weight...
of the deciding who gets to live and who doesn't.
translation.ko: 누굴 살리고 누굴 죽일지 결정해야 한다는 게

translation.en: There's differences between us, Maney,

translation.ko: 하지만 우리 둘의 차이는 그게 아니야

translation.en: You know, counting McNabb, they've killed 13.

-Who cares what they call-- -I care!
translation.ko: - 뭐라 부르든 무슨 상관... - 난 상관있어!

translation.en: People idolize them.
We need to end this.
It's never easy,
it's never pretty,
but there's always blood at the end of the road, you know that.
translation.ko: 하지만 항상 끝에는 피를 보게 돼 자네도 알잖아

translation.en: You know that the same as me.

translation.ko: 피는 많이 봤지만 그놈들 피가 아니야

translation.en: Goddamnit, Maney, why the hell…
Why the hell you even come?
I had to come.
Though I don't exactly know why.

translation.en: If Ma finds out...

translation.en: You need to come back to Austin so we can sort this out.
I understand, Lee.
If you're ready to go home, I'll drive you.
Take me to greener pastures.
I'll just get a bottle and sit there and wait for Clyde to show up.
translation.ko: 술 한 병 들고 거기서 클라이드가 나타나길 기다릴래

translation.en: Does that mean anything, you think? "Headed for greener pastures."
translation.ko: 뭔가 의미가 있을까? 더 푸른 초원으로 향한다는 게?

translation.en: Is he headed for a state he hasn't hit yet?
translation.ko: 아직 가보지 않은 다른 주로 간다는 건가?

translation.en: Could be.
What states have warrants for him?
translation.ko: 체포 영장 나온 주가 어디 어디지?

translation.en: No, better still, what states don't?
New Mexico...
Colorado,
Louisiana.
Outlaws always go home.
Maybe we just been looking at the wrong home.
Methvin, where's he from?
-Kansas. -He still have family there?
No, his dad...
lives in Bienville Parish.
East of Shreveport.
Owner lets folk squat in exchange for labor.
translation.ko: 주인이 노동의 대가로 살 곳을 무료로 내줬어

translation.en: Henry's daddy hauls wood for 'em.
That's his truck.
Ivy Methvin.
They're playing house.
She's a little bitty thing.
So's he.
You all right?
Yeah.
Fix the room back.
Probably best they weren't home.
We got no jurisdiction to arrest in these parts.
translation.ko: 우리 관할이 아니라서 체포할 권한이 없잖아

translation.en: Now, we weren't there to arrest them, Maney.
Well, then I suggest we bring in a local sheriff next time.
Okay, what if he's in on the hand?
A corrupt sheriff down this way isn't exactly remarkable.
translation.ko: 부패 보안관이 있다 해도 그리 놀랄 일은 아니야

translation.en: One way to find out.
You said you seen Clyde.
Yes, sir.
Where? North Highway?
-Most recently, two miles from-- -How do you know it him?
My name is...
Flavius Kern.
I am the Barrow family parson. May I?
Thank you.
Now, nobody knows I'm here, and you never saw me.
translation.ko: 제가 여기 있는 건 아무도 모르니까 못 본 척해 주세요

translation.en: But, the family is grateful to you
translation.ko: 하지만 우리 가문은 아주 고맙게 생각합니다

translation.en: because the kids, they're good kids. They're...
translation.ko: 왜냐하면 그 애들이... 좋은 애들이긴 한데...

translation.en: They got in a little over their heads,
translation.ko: 감당 안 되는 일에 연루됐고 소문으로는 압박도 많다던데

translation.en: but word is there's some heat on 'em down here.
translation.ko: 감당 안 되는 일에 연루됐고 소문으로는 압박도 많다던데 여기 분들은 전혀 못 보셨고 여기 왔다는 소식도 못 들으셨다니

translation.en: And I know you never saw 'em, and you never heard they was
translation.ko: 여기 분들은 전혀 못 보셨고 여기 왔다는 소식도 못 들으셨다니

translation.en: in your parish, and we'd like to keep it that way.
Clyde will try to show his appreciation to you, but the family...
translation.ko: 클라이드가 직접 감사 표시를 하려 하겠지만 우리 가문에서도...

translation.en: would like to show theirs.
Call it a contribution to the parish church.
Now, I won't take up any more of your time.
Your boy use a shotgun on that gator or...
No, we used a gig, like this here.
Listen to me, papere. I see the dogs in Bienville, I'll shoot 'em dead.
translation.ko: 잘 들어요, 비엔빌에서 눈에 띄면 그놈들 다 쏴 죽일 거요

translation.en: Take your bribe and go home, or I'll shoot your ass, too.
translation.ko: 뇌물 도로 챙겨 돌아가요 댁 엉덩이도 쏴버리기 전에

translation.en: We're not crooks here.
Well, then, you are just the gentlemen we're looking for.
translation.ko: 바로 당신 같은 분을 찾고 있었습니다

translation.en: Timber!
Mr. Ivy.
Some men over there looking for somebody to cut and haul wood.
translation.ko: 저쪽에 온 사람들이 나무 잘라 옮겨줄 사람을 찾는대요

translation.en: Say they pay fair.
You need some more hands, me and my boy, we needs the work.
translation.ko: 일손 필요하시면 저와 제 아들을 써주십시오

translation.en: Work right here.
Get to it.
Yes, sir.
-What the hell is this? -I'm Sheriff Jordan.
-This is my deputy, Mr. Oakley. -Well, who are you fellas?
translation.ko: 이쪽은 보안관 대리 오클리 그럼 그쪽은요?

translation.en: Doesn't concern you.
All you need to know is Bonnie and Clyde are going down hard, Mr. Methvin.
translation.ko: 보니와 클라이드는 죽는다는 것만 알면 됩니다, 메스빈 씨

translation.en: If not by the gun, then by the chair.
-And your boy Henry is going with them. -My boy didn't kill nobody.
translation.ko: - 당신 아들 헨리도 함께요 - 우리 애는 사람 안 죽였어요

translation.en: Killed a highway patrolman near Grapevine, Texas.
translation.ko: 텍사스주 그레이프바인 근처에서 고속도로 순찰대원을 죽였죠

translation.en: We have a witness,
ballistics, and the whole book.
Wiretaps.
We know they're gonna be coming to see you.
translation.ko: 조만간 당신 만나러 올 거라는 거 압니다

translation.en: We're gonna give your son a chance to live.
How?
Well, he's gonna have to put 'em on the spot.
He does, we'll put him on the ground, instead of in it.
translation.ko: 그럼 땅에 묻힐 일은 없게 해드리죠

translation.en: -Meaning you'll let him go? -As far as Texas is concerned, yes, sir.
They might be by in a day or two.
When you get your boy alone, you tell him to get separated first chance he gets.
translation.ko: 아드님한테 기회 되자마자 따로 나오라고 하세요

translation.en: -They'll come right back to see him. -We'll be waiting.
translation.ko: 놈들이 아드님 찾으러 오면... 우리가 기다릴 겁니다

translation.en: -Why should I trust you? -Because I said.
translation.ko: 당신들 말을 어떻게 믿죠? 내가 그렇게 말했으니까

translation.en: That's just how he's built.
Well, they got a rule.
If they get separated, they wait a couple days
for the air to clear and then meet up back at my house.
translation.ko: 분위기 조용해지면 내 집에서 만나는 거죠

translation.en: Clyde won't be taken alive.
Neither will your boy, sir, unless he takes his one chance now.
translation.ko: 아드님도 마찬가집니다 이번 기회를 놓치면 말이죠

translation.en: I like my house.
-Excuse me? -I like my house!
Clyde bought it for me, and I don't want y'all shooting it up.
translation.ko: 클라이드가 사 줬는데 총격에 날리긴 싫어요

translation.en: They'll be around for Henry. There ain't but one way in, one way out.
translation.ko: 놈들은 헨리를 찾아올 테고 드나들 길은 하나밖에 없어요

translation.en: That's Ringgold Road.
Ringgold Road.
Once my boy gets clear, you...
Well, you can kill 'em there.
All right.
Take two.
-Two. -There you go.
Looks like we're outnumbered by Texans, Henderson.
Well, we need these Dallas boys, the only ones
who can make a positive identification.
Old Ivy said that car's loaded with firepower.
translation.ko: 헨리 아버지 말로는 차에 무기가 가득하답니다

translation.en: They got machine guns, hand grenades, a thousand rounds of shells.
It's an armory on four wheels.
-Well, we'll find out. -Gonna have us a hunt.
Gonna skin us some deer.
Dang, if I don't have an Arkansas Straight.
Dallas paper gave me a camera to film it when it happens.
translation.ko: 댈러스 신문에서 사건 나면 찍으라고 카메라를 줬어요

translation.en: Said he'd pay me. Can y'all believe that?
What the hell is this world coming to?
-Well, there we go. -Three sevens?
Maybe we should put six bills in the pot, homme. Make it interesting.
translation.ko: 판돈을 왕창 올릴까요? 그래야 할 맛이 나죠

translation.en: No. Cap says no money in the game, nor drinking on Sundays.
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 대위가 일요일이니까 돈 걸지 말고 술도 마시지 말래요

translation.en: Can't be much fun.
Yeah, well, there's a place for me in heaven, I'll tell you that.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 천국에 내 자리 하나는 마련된 거죠

translation.en: What's he doing out there?
He likes to be alone sometimes.
Sheriff Smoot said you and Hamer killed more than 50 men between you.
translation.ko: 스무트 보안관님은 두 분이 사람을 50명 이상 죽였다던데요

translation.en: Killed more than that in one evening.
I didn't mean to pry.
It's all right, kid. Ante up, gents.
I was young. Younger than you.
South Texas, a place called Candelario.
Ranger Company C. Had about 60 bandits pinned down in a dry wash.
translation.ko: 레인저스 C 중대가 강도 60여 명을 말라버린 강바닥에 몰아넣었지

translation.en: These fellas burned half a dozen ranches,
killed a dozen...
and raped just about as many.
Anyway, every time we'd ride in there
translation.ko: 어쨌든 우린 그놈들을 잡으러 갈 때마다

translation.en: to take 'em, we'd yell out, "Manos arribas."
You know, "Hands up."
Well, they'd...
fire on us, and we'd lose a man. Went on like that for two days.
translation.ko: 총을 쏴댔고 우린 동료를 잃었지 이틀간 그런 식이었어

translation.en: So they sent down... young Captain Hamer,
translation.ko: 그러자 레인저스 측에서 젊은 헤이머 대위를 보낸 거야

translation.en: my friend Pancho.
Cap says... "What's going on down here?"
translation.ko: 대위는 대체 뭐 하는 거냐고 묻더군

translation.en: "Any time we yell out, 'manos arribas,' like the law tells us to...
they open up on us."
Cap says, “We're going in there afore dawn and, this time,
translation.ko: 대위는 이랬어 '이번엔 해 뜨기 전에 진입해'

translation.en: don't no-damn-body yell out 'manos arribas.' Just shoot 'em."
Well, that night...
them bandits were celebrating, drunk.
translation.ko: 강도 놈들은 파티를 열었어 술에 취해서

translation.en: Most of 'em asleep by the fire. And we went in.
translation.ko: 대개 모닥불 옆에서 잠들어 있었지 우리가 진입했어

translation.en: Some of the boys refused to go.
Refused to just start shooting men.
translation.ko: 그냥 사람을 쏘는 건 못 하겠다고

translation.en: But I went with Frank. Like I said, he's my friend.
translation.ko: 하지만 난 프랭크와 함께 갔지 말했다시피 내 친구니까

translation.en: He gave me the nod.
We let 'em have it.
We shot that arroyo all to hell before most of them fellas even woke up.
translation.ko: 놈들 대다수가 깨어나기도 전에 강바닥은 피로 물들어버렸어

translation.en: I was... jittery.
A mule came out from behind a cactus, and I...
translation.ko: 선인장 뒤에서 노새 한 마리가 나오길래

translation.en: shot the man riding it half a dozen times.
translation.ko: 거기 탄 놈을 대여섯 발 쐈는데

translation.en: Turned out to be a...
13-year-old boy just...
trying to run away.
I still see his face.
Whole thing was over in five minutes. Counted 54 dead.
Counting was over, Cap sat on a rock, holstered his gun, and said...
translation.ko: 시신 수를 다 세고는 대위가 바위에 앉아 총을 총집에 넣고 말하더군

translation.en: "Manos arribas, you sons of bitches."
Came back,
governor gave us all medals.
My boy got loose.
When he comes, he gonna be coming
from the south, which will bring him by you.
translation.ko: 그 녀석은 남쪽에서 올 겁니다 바로 앞으로 지나갈 거요

translation.en: -I figure you fellas got it from here. -Ivy...
Turn your truck around, park it the wrong side.
What?
-You're staying with us. -That wasn't part of the deal.
The deal ain't done till it's done. Now, park it.
translation.ko: 다 끝나야 끝나는 거요 그러니 주차하고

translation.en: Jack up the front right bumper and take off your tire.
translation.ko: 프런트 우측 범퍼 올리고 타이어 빼놔요

translation.en: Clyde'll slow down and help him change it.
translation.ko: 클라이드는 속도를 늦추고 도와주려 할 거야

translation.en: -What? -Stash these cars.
How do I know I ain't gonna get shot?
You okay?
Yeah. Yes, sir.
We need you to identify these two.
Nobody said nothing about having to pull the trigger,
translation.ko: 아무도 자네한테 방아쇠 당기라고 안 했어

translation.en: which means you don't have to.
-I'll be all right. -You sure?
Yeah.
When they get here, y'all stay behind the blind.
translation.ko: 놈들이 와도 다들 그대로 숨어 있어요

translation.en: I'll present myself. You fire on my command.
translation.ko: 내가 모습을 드러내면 내 명령에 따라 발포합니다

translation.en: We stay in the blind?
Yeah.
You walk out there?
That's an order, Gault.
Maney,
for the record, you only move like you're 75.
The reason I passed your house that day was 'cause I...
translation.ko: 그날 자네 집을 그냥 지나쳐 간 건...

translation.en: I wanted to spare you this.
That said, I'm...
real glad you're here.
Me, too, Pancho.
Me, too.
Ivy! Get out there!
Hurry up.
It's them.
Ford V-8.
Ted?
-Yeah. -You better look.
Yeah. It's Clyde.
This is it!
-Hey, Ivy. Need some help with that? -Yeah.
Stick 'em up.
Manos arribas.
Mr. Hamer? Excuse me, Mr. Hamer?
translation.ko: 헤이머 씨? 실례합니다 헤이머 씨, 뉴욕 연합통신에서 전화가 왔는데요

translation.en: There's a fella on the phone from the Associated Press in New York.
translation.ko: 헤이머 씨, 뉴욕 연합통신에서 전화가 왔는데요

translation.en: He says he'll give you $1,000 for a phone interview right now.
translation.ko: 지금 전화 인터뷰를 해주시면 1천 달러를 드린답니다

translation.en: Got him on the line in the back.
Mr. Hamer?
Shame on you.
The nation has been freed from the worst killing rampage in its history.
translation.ko: 이제 미국은 역사상 최악의 연쇄살인에서 벗어났습니다

translation.en: Retribution has been served, and J. Edgar Hoover
translation.ko: 인과응보가 실현되었고 J 에드거 후버 국장은

translation.en: has issued a formal announcement
that the crime spree of Bonnie and Clyde--
Care to comment on your role in the apprehension of Bonnie and Clyde?
translation.ko: 보니와 클라이드 체포에 어떤 역할을 하셨습니까?

translation.en: I knew Hamer and Gault would get the job done,
translation.ko: 헤이머와 걸트가 해낼 걸 믿고 있었습니다

translation.en: and that's why I chose 'em.
Bottom line!
